none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 21, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
Anyone know anything about this fool? I mean aside from the flawless hair and that shirt and the icy almond. You might know "See The Funny Little Clown," but you probably don't know that this is the dude responsible. Well....that smash single ain't even the banger here. Even though a thrift store in Sierra Vista, AZ stored the damn thing in the sun and half of the tape is warped to shit, the uppercut to body blow combo of "If You've Got A Heart" into the heavy "Broomstick Cowboy" makes me want to dig way deep into BOBBY GOLDSBORO's '70s AM radio glory days. Suspend preconceptions and let Bobby take you back.Â  10th ANNIVERSARY ALBUM Dream on little Broomstick Cowboy, dream while you canÂ  For soon you'll be a dreadful thing - my son, you'll be a man...

seo.title: Bobby Goldsboro - Tenth Anniversay (abridged) - Terminal Escape
